channel.title: computer on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in computer on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Brain pounding eyes vibrating too much computer
item.description: Last night when I finally went to sleep around 11 pm my brain was pounding headachey and my eyes were vibrating in a strange way like, not in a good way. I chalk it up to too much time spent on my computer. it kept me awake for a while, but I was finally able to calm myself down into sleep. I’m on my way to the dentist now, recording this with voice transcription.

item.title: new computer
item.description: 30 January 1999 A few days ago, my machine locked up and then wouldn’t reboot. It would try to boot, but where the boot manager would normally prompt with LILO: so I could type in whether I wanted to boot linux or Windows, now it just said LI and wouldn’t do nothin. Hmmm.. I was able to boot with a floppy, and even (thankfully) read all the info on this otherwise unbootable hard drive.
